text: Ilari Metsola (born August 16, 1992) is a Finnish ice hockey defenceman. He is currently playing with Peliitat Heinola in the Finnish Mestis. Metsola made his Liiga debut playing with HIFK during the 2012–13 Liiga season.http://www.ess.fi/urheilu/itshockeytime/2015/01/23/pelicans- luisteluttaa-jaalle-kauden-yhdeksannen-kotimaisen-liiga-debytanttinsa ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Helsinki Category:Finnish ice hockey defencemen Category:HIFK (ice hockey) players Category:Lahti Pelicans players
title: Ilari Metsola
